Nsorp men a~riv~meui~ P[oic m~penmakarioc n~iwt ettai/out n~ar,ie~pickopoc penpatriar,/c abba (...) nem nefc~n/ou m~p~neumatikon pipatriar,/c n~t~Antio~,ia~ Mar Ignatioc (...) nem pipatriar,/c n~Eritrea Apouna (...).

Foremost remember, O Lord, our blessed and honored father, the archbishop, our patriarch, Abba (...), and his spiritual brethren: the Patriarch of Antioch Mar Ignatius (...) and the Patriarch of Eritrea Abouna (...),

Ouoh eybe nanobi noui~ nem nicwf n~te pah/t: m~perfej peklaoc m~pih~mot n~te Pekp~neuma eyouab.
